label: specifiedPerson
comment: A contact person specified for this trade party.
A person specified to sign on behalf of this trade party.
A transport related person specified for this location party.
The contact person specified for this trade contact.
The project person specified for this requesting party.

rangeIncludes.comment: A person who is authorized to sign a document, such as a customs officer or other government official.

domainIncludes.comment: A person or department that acts as a point of contact with another person or department.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role related to a location.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
